name: Racingmaybe
description:
You think the Veyron is fast?! Supra? Ha! They can't even bend time itself! 4000 km/h, my man. That is fast. Real. Fast. By winning and upgrading your terrible car, you can also race this fast. But first, see if you can break the soundbarrier

What this game is about is gathering with friends and beating them up by racing them hard. However, if your strategy is worse than your oppnents strategy, then you might be crushed yourself. It's all about being fast and smart!

Right now this game is free-to-play. It may not be like this forever. The game is free because it is in it's early alpha stage. So do not expect amazing graphics or even sound effects...
But! Do not worry! Updates will arrive, and they will come forth frequently!

This is the current car-pool:

  • Decentra:
    Power: 220 kW
    Weight: 1400 kg
    RPM: 1000 - 7800
    Top speed: 245 km/h
    Amount of gears: 5
    Tireboost: 1.6 tbs, 1000 ms
    NOS: 0 nbs, 0 bottles, 1500 ms

  • Oldsroyal:
    Power: 410 kW
    Weight: 3207 kg
    RPM: 300 - 2500
    Top speed: 172 km/h
    Amount of gears: 4
    Tireboost: 0.5 tbs, 1500 ms, Guaranteed
    NOS: 0 nbs, 0 bottles, 1500 ms

  • Fabulvania:
    Power: 64 kW
    Weight: 1090 kg
    RPM: 800 - 5500
    Top speed: 162 km/h
    Amount of gears: 5
    Tireboost: 1 tbs, 1000 ms
    NOS: 0.6 nbs, 1 bottles, 1500 ms

  • Thoroughbred:
    Power: 300 kW
    Weight: 1549 kg
    RPM: 1200 - 9200
    Top speed: 259 km/h
    Amount of gears: 6
    Tireboost: 0 tbs, 800 ms
    NOS: 0 nbs, 0 bottles, 1300 ms

Upgrades including bonuses;


  • Clutch (7 LVLs):
    + 20 % Tireboost area
    LVL 5:
    • Gold: Guaranteed Tireboost unlocked
    • Normal: Guaranteed Tireboost unlocked, but - 3 TB
    LVL 7:
    • Gold: Unlock Super Sticky Clutch (same kW over entire powerband)
    • Normal: Convert all current TB strength to NOS strength

  • Weight reduction (7 LVLs):
    - (4 - LVL) % weight
    LVL 2:
    • Gold: Bigger Turbo- 2 % weight instead
    • Normal: Bigger Turbo no longer increases weight
    LVL 5:
    • Gold: Beefier Block no longer increases weight
    • Normal: Beefier Block + 4 % weight instead

  • Fuel (3 LVLs):
    + 2 kW * (10 * LVL)
    LVL :
    • Gold: + 15 % Top speed from Gears instead
    • Normal: + 10 % Top speed from Gears instead

  • Bigger turbo (8 LVLs):
    + 2 % weight, + 0.1 bar
    LVL 3:
    • Gold: NOS now contains an additional bottle
    • Normal: Free NOS upgrade
    LVL 5:
    • Gold: - 10 % sale on everything
    • Normal: Free NOS upgrade
    LVL 6:
    • Gold: + 2 Turbo Blow
    • Normal: Bigger Turbo + 10 % cost, + 1 Turbo Blow

  • More NOS (8 LVLs):
    + 0.3 NOS boost (+ 1 NOS bottle at first upgrade)
    LVL 3:
    • Gold: + 2 TB
    • Normal: + 0.2 TB from Tireboost
    LVL 5:
    • Gold: - 50 % off Tireboost
    • Normal: Gain additional bottle when breaking soundbarrier
    LVL 8:
    • Gold: + 32 Top speed * Amount of upgrades
    • Normal: + 120 Top speed

  • Lighter pistons (10 LVLs):
    + 4 % HP, - 4 % weight
    LVL 4:
    • Gold: + 100 % kW from Fuel even if already upgraded
    • Normal: - 10 % sale on Fuel, + 33 % kW from Fuel even if already upgraded

  • Gears (20 LVLs):
    + 92 Topspeed
    LVL 5:
    • Gold: Sequential shift unlocked
    • Normal: Sequential shift unlocked, but - 25 % NOS strength
    LVL 10:
    • Gold: Set off first NOS automatically when it's most optimal
    • Normal: + 5 % top speed

  • Beefier block (12 LVLs):
    + 170 HP, + 14 % weight
    LVL 3:
    • Gold: + 30 % TB time
    • Normal: + 15 % TB time
    LVL 5:
    • Gold: - 10 % sale on everything
    • Normal: + 30 % TB strength
    LVL 8:
    • Gold: - 20 % sale on Gears
    • Normal: - 35 % sale on Gears, but + 15 % weight and - 15 % km/h

  • Tireboost (7 LVLs):
    + 0.4 Tireboost
    LVL 3:
    • Gold: Turbo no longer spools
    • Normal: + 20 % current NOS boost
    LVL 5:
    • Gold: + 4 % NOS time from Lighter Pistons
    • Normal: Free Lighter Pistons upgrade
    LVL 7:
    • Gold: + 30 % top speed
    • Normal: + 30 % top speed, but + 260 kg

  • Money Pit (3 LVLs):
    + 100 victory money
    LVL 3:
    • Gold: 3 random free upgrades
    • Normal: Free clutch upgrade

  • Five-Star (2 LVLs):
    + 1 victory gold
    LVL 2:
    • Gold: Gain 1 Five Star
    • Normal: You get nada
